sections.text: Moped, defined.Moped shall mean a device with fully operative pedals for propulsion by human power, an automatic transmission, and a motor with a cylinder capacity not exceeding fifty cubic centimeters which produces no more than two brake horsepower and is capable of propelling the device at a maximum design speed of no more than thirty miles per hour on level ground.SourceLaws 1993, LB 370, ยง 133;Laws 2015, LB95, ยง 11.
